properties.title: Alpamare Water Park Pfäffikon
properties.abstract: Alpamare – the Caribbean on Lake Zurich – is the largest water park in Switzerland with the most spectacular slides.
properties.description:
A total of 12 unique slides with a total length of 2,100 meters await you at Alpamare. The Jungle Run slide is the longest enclosed wet slide in Europe, where you can race each other by sliding on the two tracks and measuring your time.

The tropical plants in the wave pool and at the slides make you feel like you're on a beach holiday the whole year round. Let yourself drift away is the motto of the Rio Mare river flow and you can relax further in the Alpa-Therme pool with whirlpool, the iodine-brine thermal spa pool or the wellness area with sauna and massage.

The large lawn with sun loungers available for you to use offers a fantastic view of Lake Zurich and the mountains.

For our youngest guests, there is a toddler area with slides, a children's paddling pool and a large selection of water-play features.
properties.highlights:
12 adventure slides

Wave pool with 1.20 metre high surf waves

Children's paddling pool

River flow, whirlpool, iodine-brine spa pool

Fitness and wellness area with sauna and steam bath

Showers, toilet facilities, drinking water

2 restaurants
